name: Aperitivo Julep

Fill the tin halfway with crushed ice

Add more crushed ice so the tin is two-thirds full and stir until tin is completely frosted
Add more crushed ice to form a cone above the rim
Garnish with mint bouquet in the center of the ice

name: Mint Julep
instructions: Add bourbon and simple syrup to julep tin
Fill tin halfway with crushed ice
Stir, churning the ice, for 10 seconds while holding the rim to allow tin to frost
Add more crushed ice to fill to two-thirds
Stir again until tin is completely frosted
Add more crushed ice to form a cone above the rim
Garnish with mint bouquet in the center of the ice
